title: 96/693/EC: Council Decision of 2 December 1996 fixing the amount of the Community financial contribution for 1996 to expenditure incurred by the Swedish authorities for the release of smolt
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 2 December 1996 fixing the amount of the Community financial contribution for 1996 to expenditure incurred by the Swedish authorities for the release of smolt (96/693/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: The amount of the Community financial contribution for 1996 intended to cover the expenditure on promoting salmon reproduction in the Baltic Sea shall not exceed ECU 662 508.
This Decision is addressed to the Government of Sweden.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 2 December 1996.
For the Council
The President
E. FITZGERALD
(1) OJ No L 226, 29. 8. 1980, p. 7.
